Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.

Docs.summary: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Tables. This helps in scenario where table was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission
